articles.title: Hiring stalls with US companies reluctant to expand in an uncertain economic landscape
articles.description: U.S. employers added only 22,000 jobs in the last month, indicating a cooling labor market influenced by uncertainty over economic policies.

articles.title: Most of those killed in Lisbon streetcar derailment were foreigners, police say
articles.description: A devastating streetcar crash in Lisbon, Portugal has resulted in the deaths of 16 people, with a majority of the victims being foreign nationals.

articles.title: Kennedy tries to defend COVID-19 vaccine stance in raucous Senate hearing
articles.description: Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. faced intense questioning from senators of both parties regarding his controversial positions on vaccines and recent changes within the CDC.
